page.title: 08RECREATION
page.content: Crosshill Bowling Club is a popular venue for young and old.Boys from the age of 11 years may become members of a Junior Club within this Club.They play indoor bowls in the community centre during the winter.Dancing classes for children are held weekly in the centre.The W.R.I.meets in the village and also the Young Farmers' Club.The Mobile Library visits the village every second Thursday and also visits the primary school. There are 39 members in the Kirkmichael Bowling Club.Another interest is a wine circle,a group of people who meet from Sept.to April to show and taste their home-made wines. The favourites are carrot,banana and apple.The circle began 20 years ago.It now involves 50 people.
